alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 10:42PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mitchell, Jewell, southeastern Smith, northeastern Osborne, southeastern Nuckolls and southern Thayer Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1041 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ruskin to near Mankato to near Harlan. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pockets of hail to around half inch diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mankato, Jewell, Chester, Burr Oak, Hardy, Esbon, Formoso, Byron, Ionia, Hubbell, Webber, Lovewell State Park and Montrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
